title: Event Recommendation System for Caregiver Insights
summary: As a caregiver, I want ALFRED to provide personalized event recommendations for older adults so that I can encourage their social engagement and monitor their interests effectively.

title: Social Connection Monitoring
summary: As a Health IT Compliance Officer, I want to ensure that ALFRED provides reminders for older adults' social engagements and facilitates their communication with friends and family, so that I can support caregivers in enhancing the social interaction of older adults while maintaining compliance with data privacy regulations.

title: Group Communication Features for Care Coordination
summary: As a caregiver, I want to use group messaging and video calls with older adults and family members so that I can promote community engagement and facilitate care coordination.

title: Activity Tracking and Feedback
summary: As a caregiver, I want to track older adults' participation in social activities and gather their feedback so that I can ensure they are engaged and receive better future recommendations.

title: Social Media Integration for Communication
summary: As a caregiver, I want ALFRED to enable older adults to link their social media accounts so that they can easily share health updates and stay connected with family and friends.
